name: the maeve pullover
notes:
description: 
the maeve pullover is a cozy and stylish addition to your wardrobe, featuring the same beautiful textured stitches and charming ribbing as the original maeve cardigan. this design is perfect for layering or wearing on its own, offering a comfy, relaxed fit you'll love. with a clear, easy-to-follow pattern and included video tutorial, it's a joy to make!

[this pattern is free on my blog!][1]

[this pattern is a kit with lion brand.][2] the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make your pullover plus a free copy of the pdf digital download of the pattern. you can also customize your color choices.

[a full video tutorial is included with this pattern.][3]


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/the-maeve-pullover-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: http://shrsl.com/4s8lm
  [3]: https://youtu.be/3bnw2iqbwf8
